page.title: 13MEDIA.
page.content: Ilfracombe gets 18 different papers delivered to all the newsagents.They get them from Surridge Dawson in Barnstaple.The local paper is the North Devon Journal Herald,5250 are sent to Ilfracombe per week.This makes it the most popular paper sold in the area.Next is the Advertiser which is free and is read by 5100 homes.Then the Gazette,also free,is read by 4158 homes.These figures show how many papers are sold locally:Sun-1450; Mirror-1200;Daily Express-775;Daily Mail-700;Sunday Express-525;Sunday Mail-500;Daily Star-450;Telegraph -350;Western Daily Express-150; Western Morning News-150;Sunday Times-125;Guardian-70;Times-68; Financial Times-14;Sporting life-13. The local radio which we can receive is Radio Devon.It is based in S.Devon so it is not that local to us here.
